name: Page Executive
description:
The executive search division of PageGroup, Page Executive provides a range of search, selection and talent management solutions for organisations on a permanent and interim basis. Recognised for our powerful in-house research function, speed and flexibility of response and assignment completion rates, organisations worldwide use Page Executive to secure their senior talent.
 

 Page Executive is part of PageGroup, worldwide leaders in specialist recruitment. Interested to find out more? Get in touch with Page Executive in your region.
 

 Page Executive are inclusive Recruiters and Hirers, as reflected in our Clear Assured Platinum Standard Accreditation from the Clear Company. We are passionate about attracting diverse talent and are committed to ensuring our processes are inclusive and supportive.
Headline: We go Beyond the Brief.
ShortDescription: The executive search division of PageGroup, Page Executive provides a range of search, selection and talent management solutions for organisations on a permanent and interim basis. Recognised for our powerful in-house research function, speed and flexibility of response and assignment completion rates, organisations worldwide use Page Executive to secure their senior talent.
enhanced_description: Page Executive, the executive search division of PageGroup, is a global provider of comprehensive talent acquisition solutions for senior-level roles. Their services encompass executive search, selection, and talent management, offered on both a permanent and interim basis. Page Executive distinguishes itself through a powerful in-house research function, impressive speed and flexibility of response, and high assignment completion rates, enabling organizations worldwide to quickly secure senior talent. A core aspect of their approach is a strong commitment to diversity and inclusion in recruitment, validated by their Clear Assured Platinum Standard Accreditation from the Clear Company, ensuring inclusive and supportive processes for attracting diverse talent across functional areas such as Marketing & Communications, Policy, Economics & Regulatory Affairs, and Operational & General Management.
target_industries: Organizations requiring senior talent across various functional specializations
key_use_cases: Securing senior talent for permanent positions
Finding executive talent for interim roles
Expediting the fill rate for critical open positions
Leveraging expert research for executive recruitment
Attracting and selecting diverse senior talent
competitive_advantages: Clear Assured Platinum Standard Accreditation for inclusive recruitment
roi_benefits: Successful placement of critical senior talent
Improved efficiency in executive recruitment processes
compliance_features: Clear Assured Platinum Standard Accreditation from the Clear Company (for inclusive hiring practices)
Commitment to inclusive and supportive recruitment processes for diverse talent
